topic.title: do not let zeronet become like the surfaceweb
topic.body: i am running away from the normals, do not let them come here, do not tell anyone but your closest friends about this, keep it a fucking secret

1573172203_17LTVhar6FUm7BRaj8FFcoVDVkTr1.body:
> [blahblah69](#comment_19_1ErPX9yuZjokdcxUGavdRYRhwynA4j8d6q): zeronet will never be like the surface web, there is no money to be made here.

it's not just about the money, it's about the interactions
